data.name: Soundscape VR
data.detailed_description:
Soundscape VR is the musical metaverse, home of hyper-immersive visual arts and sound experiences. Since 2014, Soundscape VR has existed to delight with the power of tech art delivered at its ultimate level. Since then the platform has been continually updated and improved by an independent team of passionate artists & music lovers. No ads, no corporate sponsorship, no data theft; just the world's most advanced audiovisual experiences, available free.


- Explore the future of music, today. Play solo or with friends

- Level up & customize your avatar in a next-gen concert experience

- Escape to fantasy worlds brought to life by music, a unique performance every time

- Enjoy Magic Mirror curated performances presented in VR or play your own songs with Freeplay

- Experience Artist Link live VR concerts & festivals elevating solo artists with world-class productions

- Connect to Soundscape Live, the world's first Metaverse Art Installation, on its sixth year of VR artistic innovation

- PC Mode coming soon - Prepare for the next level of Soundscape with all new possibilities


Be sure to check out our Discord at https://discord.gg/8cfHAEb to join in with the Soundscape music community and discover new music, new friends, plus all our latest announcements for upcoming shows.

data.short_description: Soundscape VR is the musical metaverse, home of hyper-immersive visual arts and sound experiences. Since 2014, Soundscape has existed to delight with the power of tech art delivered at its ultimate level. Gather your friends to explore audio-reactive fantasy worlds in the future of music, today.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5 3570k or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 3060 or equivalent
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 3600x or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 3070 or equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space

package_groups.name: subscriptions
package_groups.title: Buy Soundscape VR Subscription Plan
package_groups.description: To be billed on a recurring basis.

subs.option_description: 1 149₴ at checkout, auto-renewed every 1 month(s) at 1 149₴.
